mapper.select: SELECT T1.MNU_SEQ /*메뉴일련번호*/ , T1.URL /*메뉴경로*/ , T1.MNU_NM /*메뉴명*/ , T1.COMPNT_PATH /*컴퍼넌트경로*/ , T1.COMPNT_NM /*컴퍼넌트명*/ , T1.UPPER_MNU_SEQ /*상위메뉴일련번호*/ , (SELECT MNU_NM FROM tb_mnu WHERE MNU_SEQ = T1.UPPER_MNU_SEQ) AS UPPER_MNU_NM /*상위메뉴명*/ , T1.MNU_LV /*메뉴레벨*/ , T1.MNU_ORDER /*메뉴표시순서*/ , T1.MNU_INFO /*메뉴정보*/ , T2.ROLE_SEQ /*권한그룹일련번호*/ , T2.AUTH_GRADE /*권한등급(1:읽기, 2:읽기/쓰기, 3:기타권한1, 4:기타권한2 ...)*/ , T2.AUTH_NM /*권한명(1:읽기, 2:읽기/쓰기, 3:기타권한1, 4:기타권한2 ...)*/ , IF(T1.MNU_LV = 1 , T1.MNU_ORDER * 1000 , (SELECT MNU_ORDER * 1000 + T1.MNU_ORDER FROM tb_mnu WHERE MNU_SEQ = T1.UPPER_MNU_SEQ) ) AS ORDER_VAL /*메뉴순서 값(lv1 order * 1000 + lv2 order)*/ FROM tb_mnu T1 /*테이블_메뉴*/ , tb_auth T2 /*테이블_권한*/ WHERE T1.MNU_SEQ = T2.MNU_SEQ AND T2.ROLE_SEQ = #{roleSeq} AND T2.AUTH_GRADE > 0 AND T1.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND T1.MNU_LV = 2 ORDER BY ORDER_VAL ASC
